title: Covens Courageous
description: Out of work paranormal investigator Ken Parker arrives in Groverton, and meets and falls in love with cute red-headed Jinny Talbot. He discovers that Jinny is a witch, and then to his amazement he discovers that he is also a witch. He and Jinny join with the covens to battle warlocks, vampires, and the Ghost of Mordecai Grover.
author: James Hartley
